BUY.description: Buy a piece of ship equipment

FITTING_IS_INCLUDED_IN_THE_PRICE.description: Regarding installing a component on the ship
FITTING_IS_INCLUDED_IN_THE_PRICE.message: 安装费已经包含在售价内了.

FLAVOUR_0_BODY.message: 你好! 我叫 {name}, 现在正在出售 {equipment} 旧货一件. 我打算卖 {price}.

FLAVOUR_1_BODY.message: 嗨! 我叫 {name}. 我在出售一件几乎全新的 {equipment}, 只卖 {price}.

FLAVOUR_2_BODY.message: 你好! 我是 {name}, 正在卖一个非常好的 {equipment}, 只用花费 {price} 就能买到了.

FLAVOUR_3_BODY.message: 你好! 我想要出手一个多余的 {equipment}, 我的开价是 {price}.

FLAVOUR_4_BODY.message: 嗨! 我们有一件多余的 {equipment} 看上去挺适合你的, 只卖 {price}.

FLAVOUR_4_TEXT.message: 待售：仅剩一台{equipment}，状况良好。

FLAVOUR_5_BODY.message: 你好! 你想要买我老旧的 {equipment} 吗? 它运作得很好, 但是我现在换了一个新的, 不需要它了. 只用出 {price} 就能拿走它.

HAS_BEEN_FITTED_TO_YOUR_SHIP.message: {equipment} 已经装在你的飞船上了.

HOW_DO_I_FITT_IT.description: Regarding installing a component on the ship

NO_LONGER_AVAILABLE_0.description: If the sentence is hard to translate, just make up an excuse why the item is no longer available.
NO_LONGER_AVAILABLE_0.message: 抱歉, 它已经被卖出去了!

NO_LONGER_AVAILABLE_1.description: If the sentence is hard to translate, just make up an excuse why the item is no longer available.
NO_LONGER_AVAILABLE_1.message: 我的同事好像刚刚将它卖给另一位客户. 十分抱歉!

NO_LONGER_AVAILABLE_2.description: If the sentence is hard to translate, just make up an excuse why the item is no longer available.
NO_LONGER_AVAILABLE_2.message: 我改主意了, 这玩意现在是非卖品.
